Name: Killing Sun / 抗日大刀队：日军总部
About the game: Hey! I am a big fan of 'Wolfenstein 3D' and John Romero. I made this game to show my respect to them. I have collected and studied a lot of videos and articles of John Romero, learned a lot about game design concepts, and applied them to my game. For example, horseshoe-shaped game level design. Content 27 well-designed game levels 17 kinds of ferocious enemies 10 kinds of expected supplies 8 kinds of weapons with distinctive features 3 exciting BOSS battles Nearly 100 tricky secret locations Action Move – WASD Fast Move - Shift + WASD Switch Weapons - 1～6 Grenade - G Weapons Da Dao – With the strongest attack power! For close fight only. Pistol – Better than nothing for a while if there are no other long-range weapons. Shotgun – As an Old School FPS, how can there be no shotgun? Rifle - One shot one kill! Submachine gun - pit-a-pat! Heavy machine guns - good spread! Grenade – Boom! Oil drum - Boom! Boom! Boom! Tip Try to find all the secret locations and you will get many surprises. This is not difficult, because the locations are all marked on the compass.
